phrs.translation: 鼻炎, 鼻伤风, 卡他性鼻炎
传染性鼻炎, 鸡流行性感冒, 鸡传染性鼻炎, 传染性可利查
鸡流行性感冒, 鸡鼻炎, 家禽鼻炎
臭鼻症, 翻译, 臭鼻

sentences.sentence: See the nose for any discharge: -coryza.
sentences.translation: 看到鼻子的任何放电：-鼻炎。

sentences.sentence: A measles case was defined as fever and rash and one or more of cough, coryza or conjunctivitis.
sentences.translation: 麻疹病例定义为发烧、发疹伴以咳嗽、流涕或结膜炎等一种或多种症状。

sentences.sentence: Purpose to evaluate the value of CT to the diagnosis and operation of chronic coryza and sinusitis in youth.
sentences.translation: 目的：评价CT检查对青少年慢性鼻炎鼻窦炎的临床诊断和手术治疗的价值。
